alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 02 at 4:47AM MST until January 02 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow showers above 6000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 6000 feet near Doney Park, Flagstaff, Forest Lakes, Heber-Overgaard and Williams. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Additional snow forecast from 4 AM Today to 8 AM Today: Doney Park 0 to 1 inches Flagstaff 0 to 1 inches Forest Lakes 1 to 3 inches Heber-Overgaard 0 to 1 inches Williams 0 to 1 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim
